title.rendered: Vine Edition: New CPI data and GTA Real Estate Market Update

content.rendered:
Following the latest CPI data release, Donal Ward McCarthy and Hugo Dos Reis talk about the current real estate market in the Greater Toronto Area. The inflation rate is currently sitting at 7.6%. What does this mean for the mortgage interest rates and the real estate market?

Listen on Spotify

excerpt.rendered: Following the latest CPI data release, Donal Ward McCarthy and Hugo Dos Reis talk about the current real estate market in the Greater Toronto Area. The inflation rate is currently sitting at 7.6%. What does this mean for the mortgage interest rates and the real estate market?
